post.summary: Find transactions by Address and/or Time

get.summary: Find transactions by Address and/or Time

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The coin symbol (default: btc).

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: The start time to search from (unix timestamp).

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: The end time to search to (unix timestamp).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset of results to start from.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of results to return.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Extra flags for including fields
Sepecific values.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Include the data object.

parameters.name: raw
parameters.description: Include the raw tx or block in base64.

parameters.name: tx
parameters.description: Include transaction ids in block.
